38namespace bitpit {
39
40class StencilSolverAssembler : public SystemMatrixAssembler {
41
42public:
43 virtual void getRowConstant(long rowIndex, bitpit::ConstProxyVector<double> *constant) const = 0;
44
45protected:
46 using SystemMatrixAssembler::SystemMatrixAssembler;
47
48};
49
50template<typename stencil_t>
51class DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface {
52
53public:
54 virtual ~DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface() = default;
55
56 virtual std::size_t size() const = 0;
57
58 virtual const stencil_t & at(long rowIndex) const = 0;
59 virtual const stencil_t & rawAt(std::size_t rowRawIndex) const = 0;
60
61 virtual const stencil_t & at(long blockIndex, int componentIdx) const = 0;
62 virtual const stencil_t & rawAt(std::size_t blockRawIndex, int componentIdx) const = 0;
63
64protected:
65 DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface() = default;
66
67};
68
69template<typename stencil_t, typename stencil_container_t>
70class DiscretizationStencilProxyBaseStorage : public DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface<stencil_t> {
71
72protected:
73 const stencil_container_t *m_stencils;
74 int m_stride;
75
76 DiscretizationStencilProxyBaseStorage(const stencil_container_t *stencils, int stride);
77
78};
79
80template<typename stencil_t, typename stencil_container_t>
81class DiscretizationStencilProxyStorage : public DiscretizationStencilProxyBaseStorage<stencil_t, stencil_container_t> {
82
83public:
84 DiscretizationStencilProxyStorage(const stencil_container_t *stencils);
85
86 std::size_t size() const override;
87
88 const stencil_t & at(long rowIndex) const override;
89 const stencil_t & rawAt(std::size_t rowRawIndex) const override;
90
91 const stencil_t & at(long blockIndex, int componentIdx) const override;
92 const stencil_t & rawAt(std::size_t blockRawIndex, int componentIdx) const override;
93
94};
95
96template<typename stencil_t>
97class DiscretizationStencilProxyStorage<stencil_t, PiercedStorage<stencil_t>> : public DiscretizationStencilProxyBaseStorage<stencil_t, PiercedStorage<stencil_t>> {
98
99public:
100 DiscretizationStencilProxyStorage(const PiercedStorage<stencil_t> *stencils);
101
102 std::size_t size() const override;
103
104 const stencil_t & at(long rowIndex) const override;
105 const stencil_t & rawAt(std::size_t rowRawIndex) const override;
106
107 const stencil_t & at(long blockIndex, int componentIdx) const override;
108 const stencil_t & rawAt(std::size_t blockRawIndex, int componentIdx) const override;
109
110};
111
112template<typename stencil_t>
113class DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler : public StencilSolverAssembler {
114
115public:
116 typedef stencil_t stencil_type;
117
118 template<typename stencil_container_t = std::vector<stencil_t>>
119 DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler(const stencil_container_t *stencils);
120#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
121 template<typename stencil_container_t = std::vector<stencil_t>>
122 DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler(MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned, const stencil_container_t *stencils);
123#endif
124
125 AssemblyOptions getOptions() const override;
126
127 int getBlockSize() const override;
128
129 long getRowCount() const override;
130 long getColCount() const override;
131
132 long getRowElementCount() const override;
133 long getColElementCount() const override;
134
135#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
136 long getRowGlobalCount() const override;
137 long getColGlobalCount() const override;
138
139 long getRowGlobalElementCount() const override;
140 long getColGlobalElementCount() const override;
141
142 long getRowGlobalOffset() const override;
143 long getColGlobalOffset() const override;
144
145 long getRowGlobalElementOffset() const override;
146 long getColGlobalElementOffset() const override;
147#endif
148
149 long getRowNZCount(long rowIndex) const override;
150 long getMaxRowNZCount() const override;
151
152 void getRowPattern(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern) const override;
153 void getRowValues(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const override;
154 void getRowData(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const override;
155
156 void getRowConstant(long rowIndex, bitpit::ConstProxyVector<double> *constant) const override;
157
158protected:
159 long m_nRows;
160 long m_nCols;
161
162#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
163 long m_nGlobalRows;
164 long m_nGlobalCols;
165
166 long m_globalRowOffset;
167 long m_globalColOffset;
168#endif
169
170 std::unique_ptr<DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface<stencil_t>> m_stencils;
171
172 int m_blockSize;
173
174 long m_maxRowNZ;
175
176 DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler(std::unique_ptr<DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface<stencil_t>> &&stencils);
177#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
178 DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler(MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned, std::unique_ptr<DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface<stencil_t>> &&stencils);
179#endif
180 DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler();
181
182 void setStencils(std::unique_ptr<DiscretizationStencilStorageInterface<stencil_t>> &&stencils);
183
184#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
185 void setMatrixSizes(MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned);
186 void setMatrixSizes(long nRows, long nCols, MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned);
187#else
188 void setMatrixSizes();
189 void setMatrixSizes(long nRows, long nCols);
190#endif
191
192 void setBlockSize();
193 void setBlockSize(int blockSize);
194
195 void setMaximumRowNZ();
196 void setMaximumRowNZ(long maxRowNZ);
197
198 virtual const stencil_t & getRowStencil(long rowIndex) const;
199
200 void getPattern(const stencil_t &stencil, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern) const;
201
202 template<typename U = typename stencil_t::weight_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_fundamental<U>::value>::type * = nullptr>
203 void getValues(const stencil_t &stencil, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const;
204
205 template<typename U = typename stencil_t::weight_type, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_fundamental<U>::value>::type * = nullptr>
206 void getValues(const stencil_t &stencil, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const;
207
208 template<typename U = typename stencil_t::weight_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_fundamental<U>::value>::type * = nullptr>
209 void getConstant(const stencil_t &stencil, bitpit::ConstProxyVector<double> *constant) const;
210
211 template<typename U = typename stencil_t::weight_type, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_fundamental<U>::value>::type * = nullptr>
212 void getConstant(const stencil_t &stencil, bitpit::ConstProxyVector<double> *constant) const;
213
214 double getRawValue(const typename stencil_t::weight_type &weight, int item) const;
215
216};
217
218template<typename stencil_t>
219class DiscretizationStencilSolver : public SystemSolver {
220
221public:
222 DiscretizationStencilSolver(bool debug = false);
223 DiscretizationStencilSolver(bool transpose, bool debug);
224 DiscretizationStencilSolver(bool flatten, bool transpose, bool debug);
225 DiscretizationStencilSolver(const std::string &prefix, bool debug = false);
226 DiscretizationStencilSolver(const std::string &prefix, bool transpose, bool debug = false);
227 DiscretizationStencilSolver(const std::string &prefix, bool flatten, bool transpose, bool debug = false);
228
229 void clear(bool release = false);
230 template<typename stencil_container_t = std::vector<stencil_t>>
231 void assembly(const stencil_container_t &stencils);
232 void assembly(const DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<stencil_t> &assembler);
233 void assembly(const StencilSolverAssembler &assembler);
234#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
235 template<typename stencil_container_t = std::vector<stencil_t>>
236 void assembly(MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned, const stencil_container_t &stencils);
237 void assembly(MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned, const DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<stencil_t> &assembler);
238 void assembly(MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned, const StencilSolverAssembler &assembler);
239#endif
240 template<typename stencil_container_t = std::vector<stencil_t>>
241 void update(const stencil_container_t &stencils);
242 template<typename stencil_container_t = std::vector<stencil_t>>
243 void update(const std::vector<long> &rows, const stencil_container_t &stencils);
244 template<typename stencil_container_t = std::vector<stencil_t>>
245 void update(std::size_t nRows, const long *rows, const stencil_container_t &stencils);
246 void update(std::size_t nRows, const long *rows, const StencilSolverAssembler &assembler);
247 void update(std::size_t nRows, const long *rows, const DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<stencil_t> &assembler);
248
249 void solve();
250
251protected:
252 std::size_t nStencils;
253
254 std::vector<double> m_constants;
255
256 void assembleConstants(const StencilSolverAssembler &assembler);
257 void updateConstants(std::size_t nRows, const long *rows, const StencilSolverAssembler &assembler);
258
259};
260
261// Specializations
262template<>
263void DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilScalar>::setBlockSize();
264
265template<>
266double DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilScalar>::getRawValue(const StencilScalar::weight_type &element, int item) const;
267
268template<>
269void DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilVector>::setBlockSize();
270
271template<>
272double DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilVector>::getRawValue(const StencilVector::weight_type &element, int item) const;
273
274template<>
275void DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilBlock>::setBlockSize();
276
277template<>
278double DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilBlock>::getRawValue(const StencilBlock::weight_type &element, int item) const;
279
280}

285// Declaration of the typdefs
286namespace bitpit {
287
288typedef DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilScalar> StencilScalarSolverAssembler;
289typedef DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilVector> StencilVectorSolverAssembler;
290typedef DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilBlock> StencilBlockSolverAssembler;
291
292typedef DiscretizationStencilSolver<StencilScalar> StencilScalarSolver;
293typedef DiscretizationStencilSolver<StencilVector> StencilVectorSolver;
294typedef DiscretizationStencilSolver<StencilBlock> StencilBlockSolver;
295
296}
